profileAlternative.name: Abubakar Audu
profileAlternative.headline: Python Developer at Insight Global/Honeywell
profileAlternative.summary:
I have a master’s in Electrical Engineering and a double bachelor’s in Computer Science and Electrical Eng. Tech. with a minor in mathematics.

I worked at Honeywell as a portal developer for almost two years. The portal is a Meter Data Management (MDM) system that is designed using Django. I also worked on a system that is designed in Django with Ext JS (Sencha) front-end, that helps utilities detect power theft.

I previously worked as a sub-system engineer student employee at John Deere where I did both hardware and software testing.

I also worked as a Senior Drupal Developer at the University of Northern Iowa. I built department websites and used PHP to create standardized features and modules in Drupal that are used across campus.
I have excellent communication and writing skills. I always maintain a professional manner when communicating with people. I’m an excellent team player. My versatility and experience make me an excellent candidate for this position.

aboutAlternative.text:
I have a master’s in Electrical Engineering and a double bachelor’s in Computer Science and Electrical Eng. Tech. with a minor in mathematics.

I worked at Honeywell as a portal developer for almost two years. The portal is a Meter Data Management (MDM) system that is designed using Django. I also worked on a system that is designed in Django with Ext JS (Sencha) front-end, that helps utilities detect power theft.

I previously worked as a sub-system engineer student employee at John Deere where I did both hardware and software testing.

I have excellent communication and writing skills. I always maintain a professional manner when communicating with people. I’m an excellent team player. My versatility and experience make me an excellent candidate for this position.

positions.title: Python Developer
positions.description:
Work as core group member in developing and maintaining a system to help utilities detect power theft

Translated the portal into French and marked it for Spanish and Portuguese using Django Localization (l10n) and Internationalization (i18n) to target the South American market

Developed a system that monitors electricity usage and alert users of usage spikes
Included algorithm to analyze register readings delta for users that are not using load profile meters

positions.title: Student Employee --Subsystem Engineer
positions.description:
Automated a lot of the Hardware/Software groups’ Excel tedious tasks with excel VBA and non-Excel tasks with Python thereby freeing the test engineers to perform other tasks

Wrote programs in the John Deere Common Test Language (JDCTL) to automate testing tractor components such as the Primary Display Unit (PDU), the Hitch and the Infinitely Variable Transmission (IVT)
Wrote Hardware testing procedures based on a standard

Checked tractors status daily, fixed impending issues and update the Hardware/Software engineers so they know when to go out and work on a tractor.

Performed data analysis on vehicle CANLog weekly and update the engineers from around the world about the status of the tractors


…
see more

positions.title: Senior Drupal Developer
positions.description:
Contributed in website development for the university Department of Theater, Department of Language and Literature, UNI senate

Developed website for Iowa Spacegrant and Iowa Math and Science

Contributed in developing standardized features and modules in Drupal to be used across all the university departmental websites

…
see more
